channel.title: [525] "You cannot spawn that item" [525]
channel.description:
Ok, i checked Moparscape Forums and www.Google.com, there usally reliable but it seems most people dont have this trouble.
I was just wondering how to make a Item id "::item (Id) (Amount)" Not spawnable for a Pickup server. Like you cannot spawn all other items except Dragon Claws, but you can get them From a PVP drop.
Thanks, sorry if this has been posted before i just cant find it.
- Blood Zeus

item.title: [525] "You cannot spawn that item" [525]
item.dc:creator: @WiseMen WiseMen
item.description:
@WiseMen wrote:

Code: [Select]
int nonSpawnables[] = {####, ####};

for (int i = 0; i < nonSpawnables.length; i++) {
if (Integer.valueOf(cmd[1]) == nonSpawnables[i]) {
player.sm(“You cannot spawn this item.”);
return;
}
}

I’m codinga a 525 with the base codeusa? Anymore information, where I should put this

Read full topic

item.title: [525] "You cannot spawn that item" [525]
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Just use a simple array to store the id’s in which you can’t spawn.

In the ‘Pickup’ class, or whatever the spawning command is:

Within the ‘execute’ method, add:

[code]int nonSpawnables[] = {####, ####};

for (int i = 0; i < nonSpawnables.length; i++) {
if (Integer.valueOf(cmd[1]) == nonSpawnables[i]) {
player.sm(“You cannot spawn this item.”);
return;
}
}[/code]

Read full topic
